knimeNode.name: PMI Calculation
knimeNode.shortDescription: Node to calculate Principle Moments of Inertia (PMI) and derived properties

fullDescription.intro:
This node calculates the Principle Moments of Inertia (PMIs) for a molecule, and the normalised ratios (nPMIs) I1/I3 and I2/I3, which are widely used in the "PMI plot" to describe molecular shape.
For further information on the PMI plot see:
Wolfgang H. B. Sauer and Matthias K. Schwarz " Molecular Shape Diversity of Combinatorial Libraries: A Prerequisite for Broad Bioactivity ", J. Chem. Inf. Comput. Sci. 2003, 43 , 987-1003 DOI: 10.1021/ci025599w
This node was developed by Vernalis Research . For feedback and more information, please contact
knime@vernalis.com

option.name: Principle Moments of Inertia (PMI; I1, I2, I3)

fullDescription.option: Report the actual Principle Moments of Inertia (PMIs)

ports.outPort: The input port with PMIs and/or nPMIs calculated
